title: Sausage and Shrimp Gumbo Recipe
description: This sausage and shrimp gumbo features bell peppers, celery, onion, and okra simmered in a rich, thick, spicy broth ladled into bowls over white rice.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Trusted Brands: Recipes and Tips Hillshire Farm® Sausage and Shrimp Gumbo 4.7 (63) 54 Reviews 35 Photos This Cajun sausage and shrimp gumbo with bell peppers and okra in a rich broth is ladled into bowls over rice. Submitted by Hillshire FarmR Brand Updated on November 26, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 35 35 35 35 Prep Time: 20 mins Cook Time: 45 mins Total Time: 1 hr 5 mins Servings: 6 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 6 servings 1 (14 ounce) package Hillshire Farm Smoked Sausage ¼ cup cooking oil ¼ cup flour 1 onion, chopped 1 green bell pepper, seeded, chopped 1 red bell pepper, seeded, chopped 1 cup chopped celery 1 cup frozen sliced okra 2 cloves garlic, chopped 2 teaspoons Cajun seasoning 2 cups chicken broth ½ teaspoon hot pepper sauce ½ teaspoon ground black pepper salt to taste ½ pound large raw shrimp, peeled, deveined 3 cups hot cooked long-grain white rice Directions Cut sausage into 1/2-inch slices; set aside. Combine oil and flour in a 4-quart heavy saucepan; mix until smooth. Cook and stir over medium-high heat for 3 minutes. Reduce heat to medium; cook and stir until roux is a dark reddish brown, 6 to 8 minutes. Stir in onion, bell peppers, celery, okra and garlic; cook and stir until vegetables are tender, 8 to 10 minutes. Stir in Cajun seasoning. Pour in broth; bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 1 minute. Reduce heat to low; add sausage, pepper sauce, black pepper and salt. Cover and simmer for 15 minutes. Remove the lid and bring to a boil; add shrimp and cook until shrimp turn pink, about 3 minutes. Portion rice into bowls. Ladle gumbo over rice. Bibi I Made It Print 203 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 486 Calories 29g Fat 36g Carbs 18g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 6 Calories 486 % Daily Value * Total Fat 29g 37% Saturated Fat 9g 44% Cholesterol 99mg 33% Sodium 848mg 37% Total Carbohydrate 36g 13% Dietary Fiber 3g 11% Total Sugars 3g Protein 18g 37% Vitamin C 48mg 53% Calcium 52mg 4% Iron 3mg 14% Potassium 309mg 7% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Sausage and Shrimp Gumbo 01 of 35 Photo by  Bibi 02 of 35 Photo by  wayzworld 09/07/2021 03 of 35 Photo by  Mary Anne 01/31/2021 Made it with only a teaspoon or so of Cajun seasoning. I think it's better with more. Also used a can of diced tomatoes and no pepper sauce, also used Spanish rice. It was very good. 04 of 35 Photo by  DSyfert 10/05/2020 05 of 35 Photo by  DSyfert 10/05/2020 06 of 35 Photo by  willie jordan 07/08/2020 07 of 35 Photo by  Ms Lady 02/23/2020 I added half a pound of chicken cut into cubes (2 pieces fit on a spoon). I put it in with the veggies but left out the okra. I doubled the cajun seasoning. Plan on making it again on our next snow day. 08 of 35 Photo by  NewYorkE 01/25/2020 09 of 35 Photo by  Jon Felice 01/19/2020 10 of 35 Photo by  herbgardener 01/08/2020 We loved this! I added a can of diced tomatoes and another teaspoon of Cajun seasoning. Loved how easy it was compared to the half day versions. Thank you! 1 2 3 4 Next You’ll Also Love Shrimp and Smoked Sausage Jambalaya 55 Ratings Healthier Slow Cooker Gumbo 19 Ratings Classic Smoked Sausage & Peppers 96 Ratings Simple Slow Cooker Jambalaya 36 Ratings Cowboy Pie 18 Ratings Smoked Sausage and Tortellini Skillet 80 Ratings Baked Chicken and Sausage Gumbo 11 Ratings Husband's Grandmother's Shrimp Gumbo 108 Ratings Pesto Spaghetti Squash Skillet with Hillshire Farm Smoked Sausage 40 Ratings Fire Roasted Vegetarian Gumbo 13 Ratings Roux-Based Authentic Seafood Gumbo with Okra 20 Ratings Chicken Gumbo Wow Shrimp and Okra Gumbo 155 Ratings Easy Creole Okra and Shrimp 88 Ratings Slow Cooker Chicken Gumbo with Shrimp 91 Ratings Smoked Sausage, Pumpkin, and Collard Greens Lasagna 5 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
